tool_description: brighter AI’s Identity Protection Suite (IPS) offers various solutions to automatically redact faces and license plates on images and videos with the highest quality. Protect personally identifiable information in images and videos against identification through facial or license plate recognition software and comply with data privacy regulations. Anonymise image and video material without losing compatibility with analytics and machine learning through our unique DNAT solution. Speed up public data collection and data sharing across domains, such as autonomous driving, video analytics, labelling, and video management systems.
name: brighter AI Identity Protection Suite
title: brighter AI Identity Protection Suite

api_list.name: /{service}/v3/{out_type}/{output_id}/status

required_parameters.name: output_id
required_parameters.description: ID of the resource in UUID format.

required_parameters.name: service
required_parameters.description: Selection of the service to be performed on this endpoint. Current services are a traditional blur anonymization (blur), a natural anonymization (dnat) based on Brighter AI's Deep Natural Anonymization™ technology, and an extraction service of the original personal identifiable information (PIIs) (extract).

required_parameters.name: out_type
required_parameters.description: Output resource type of the service. Supports videos, images, archives and overlays. Overlays only contain the targeted PIIs without the original background.
